parameterDecorators.name: fromToken
parameterDecorators.description: (IERC20) Address of token or `address(0)` for Ether.

parameterDecorators.name: destToken
parameterDecorators.description: (IERC20) Address of token or `address(0)` for Ether.

parameterDecorators.name: parts
parameterDecorators.description: (uint256) Number of pieces source volume could be splitted, works like granularity, higly affects gas usage. Should be called offchain, but could be called onchain if user swaps not his own funds, but this is still considered as not safe.

parameterDecorators.name: flags
parameterDecorators.description: (uint256) Flags for enabling and disabling some features, default 0.

parameterDecorators.name: fromToken
parameterDecorators.description: (IERC20) Address of token or `address(0)` for Ether.

parameterDecorators.name: destToken
parameterDecorators.description: (IERC20) Address of token or `address(0)` for Ether.

parameterDecorators.name: distribution
parameterDecorators.description: (uint256[]) Array of weights for volume distribution returned by `getExpectedReturn`.

parameterDecorators.name: flags
parameterDecorators.description: (uint256) Flags for enabling and disabling some features, default 0.
